naics.externalReference: Click here to find your NAICS code
naics.label: NAICS code

options.label: 711310 - Promoters of Performing Arts, Sports and Similar Events with Facilities
711320 - Promoters of Performing Arts, Sports and Similar Events without Facilities

naics.tooltipText:
The NAICS Code System is used by Federal Statistical Agencies to collect, analyze, and publish statistical data related to the U.S. Economy.
NAICS is a Self-Assigned System; no one assigns you a NAICS Code.
What this means is a company selects the code that best depicts their primary business activity and then uses it when asked for their code.

amountRequested.label: Amount Requested
amountRequested.tooltipText:
Grant Calculation Maximum Eligible Amount
20% of 2019 Annual Gross Revenue earned in California. $250,000*


*If an eligible independent live event has been previously awarded a grant under the California Small Business COVID-19 Relief Grant Program, the amount of that grant award shall be subtracted from the eligible grant amount under this California Venues Grant Program. If the grant amount awarded under the California Small Business COVID-19 Relief Grant Program is greater than the amount awarded under this California Venues Grant Program, the eligible independent live event shall not receive a grant under this program.
